original_title: Opry Video Classics: Kings of Country
overview: Stars like Eddy Arnold, Johnny Cash and Waylon Jennings became larger-than-life figures to their fans and collectively dominated the scene from the ‘40s through the ‘70s. Kings of Country features performances by these artists, along with some classic honky-tonk by Ernest Tubb and Ray Price, plus many more!
title: Opry Video Classics: Kings of Country
